name: Research Article Writing and Publishing in Good Impact Journal
content: IFERP organizes the webinar on “Research Article Writing and Publishing in Good Impact Journal” on June 13th, 2020 | 04.00 PM - 06.00 PM | Registration Fee INR 99\. The theme of the webinar is “Publishing research articles in high impact journals”. The webinar focus on deciding the title of the research paper, writing a research article, drafting the abstract, selecting and publishing in a good impact journal.
